name: Jellyfish Sightings Along the Italian Coastline from 2009 to 2017
description: The lack of gelatinous blooms data reveals scant attention to such phenomena due to theirirregular occurrence (Boero et al. 2008), to modern publication trends thatgive no importance to observations (Boero 2013b), to current monitoring programsthat usually do not cover jellyfish(RiisgÃ¥rd et al. 2012) andto the lackof remote sensing tools to detect jellyfish. From 2009the Italian project Occhio alla Medusa started involving citizens to recordsightings of gelatinousorganisms. In 2010 till 2015, the Italian popular science magazine FOCUS supported the campaign dedicating a webpage and releasing a smartphone app to uploadrecords.

abstract: The lack of gelatinous blooms data reveals scant attention to such phenomena due to theirirregular occurrence (Boero et al. 2008), to modern publication trends thatgive no importance to observations (Boero 2013b), to current monitoring programsthat usually do not cover jellyfish(RiisgÃ¥rd et al. 2012) andto the lackof remote sensing tools to detect jellyfish. From 2009the Italian project Occhio alla Medusa started involving citizens to recordsightings of gelatinousorganisms. In 2010 till 2015, the Italian popular science magazine FOCUS supported the campaign dedicating a webpage and releasing a smartphone app to uploadrecords.
